articles.content: A vegetarian passenger was served chicken pieces in her veg meal on an Air India flight. Enraged, she complained about the same to the cabin crew but no action was taken on the matter. Finally the pa… [+2901 chars]

articles.title: 3 stocks to play aviation theme; add these 2 IT largecaps: Sanjiv Bhasin - The Economic Times
articles.description: Sanjiv Bhasin recommends adding HCL Tech and Wipro in the largecap space, as the IT sector is performing well. In the two-wheeler pack led by Hero MotoCorp and Bajaj Auto, which are benefiting from the revival of rural incomes and their adaptation to EVs. Bha…
articles.content: Sanjiv Bhasin, Director, IIFL Securities, says Indigo, GMR and Ashok Leyland are the right way of playing the aviation theme. I continue to play Indigo. But do not miss the infrastructure. GMR is at … [+7546 chars]
